titles.title: A bill to transfer ownership of certain lands held in trust for the Blackfeet Tribe, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

bill.summary: 3/20/1987--Introduced. Makes transfers of described land and payments of specified amounts involving two named individuals, the Blackfeet Tribe, and the United States in full settlement of all claims of one of those individuals.
